test.name: Reset Password As Client

kw.name: Reset Password
Open Browser To Application
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
This keyword opens the browser to the application base URL plus the desired target URL.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//a[contains(@class, 'btn-link') and contains(text(), 'Forgot your password?')]' is displayed.
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//a[contains(@class, 'btn-link') and contains(text(), 'Forgot your password?')]'.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.arg: xpath=//button[@type='submit' and contains(text(), 'Send Password Reset Link')]
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.msg: Clicking button 'xpath=//button[@type='submit' and contains(text(), 'Send Password Reset Link')]'.
kw.arg: xpath=//button[@type='submit' and contains(text(), 'Send Password Reset Link')]
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait For Reset Password Notification And Get Link
Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=mailtrap, url=https://mailtrap.io/api/accounts/2019161, headers={'Authorization': 'Bearer 5c391e9236394e86cf5f51d88f84687b'}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=True, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Convert To Integer
kw.doc: Converts the given item to an integer number.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

# Hello!
You are receiving this email because we received a password reset request for your account.
Reset Password: http://localhost/password/reset/9ef062163d473b1da2961986ad2946fce024b469f743845af7b327e4a6035109?email=pmcastro%40example.com
This password reset link will expire in 60 minutes.
If you did not request a password reset, no further action is required.
Regards, Capsure
If you're having trouble clicking the "Reset Password" button, copy and paste the URL below into your web browser: [http://localhost/password/reset/9ef062163d473b1da2961986ad2946fce024b469f743845af7b327e4a6035109?email=pmcastro%40example.com](http://localhost/password/reset/9ef062163d473b1da2961986ad2946fce024b469f743845af7b327e4a6035109?email=pmcastro%40example.com)
Â© 2025 Capsure. All rights reserved.
